 <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא‎</span>, [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלוֺא‎</span>] **noun masculine**<sup>[[Isa.8|Isa 8]]</sup>[[Isa.1.4|Isa 1:4]] ==fulness, that which fills== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>2729</sup>); — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> construct [[Gen.48.19|Gen 48:19]] + 19 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלוֺ‎</span> [[Ezek.41.8|Ezek 41:8]] suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלוֺאוֺ‎</span> [[Isa.42.10|Isa 42:10]] + 3 t.; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלוֺאָהּ‎</span> [[Deut.33.16|Deut 33:16]] + 12 t.; — 

**1.** ***fulness*** of hand (= handful) [[Eccl.4.6|Eccl 4:6]] (twice in verse) followed by accusative of material <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎חָפְנֵיכֶם פִּיחַ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Exod.9.8|Exod 9:8]] compare [[Lev.16.12|Lev 16:12]]; [[1Kgs.17.12|1Kgs 17:12]] so homer-full of manna; [[Exod.16.33|Exod 16:33]] compare [[Lev.16.12|Lev 16:12]]; [[Num.22.18|Num 22:18]]; [[Num.24.13|Num 24:13]]; [[Judg.6.38|Judg 6:38]] simil. <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מְלֹא בְגְדוֺ‎</span> [[2Kgs.4.39|2Kgs 4:39]] rarely followed by <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Lev.2.2|Lev 2:2]]; [[Lev.5.12|Lev 5:12]], compare [[Exod.16.32|Exod 16:32]] (but read perhaps <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִלְאוּ‎</span> so [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]] [[BDB#Sam|⅏]] see [[BDB#Di|Di]]). 

**2.** ***mass*** of shepherds [[Isa.31.4|Isa 31:4]] (in sim); ***multitude*** of nations [[Gen.48.19|Gen 48:19]] (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> Qor 2:247 and elsewhere) 

**3.** ***fullness*** = ***that which fills, entire contents***, of <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אֶרֶץ‎</span> [[Deut.33.16|Deut 33:16]]; [[Ps.24.1|Ps 24:1]]; [[Isa.6.3|Isa 6:3]]; [[Isa.8.8|Isa 8:8]]; [[Isa.34.1|Isa 34:1]]; [[Mic.1.2|Mic 1:2]]; [[Jer.8.16|Jer 8:16]]; [[Jer.47.2|Jer 47:2]]; [[Ezek.12.19|Ezek 12:19]]; [[Ezek.19.7|Ezek 19:7]]; [[Ezek.30.12|Ezek 30:12]]; [[Ezek.32.15|Ezek 32:15]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תֵּבֵל‎</span> [[Ps.50.12|Ps 50:12]]; [[Ps.89.12|Ps 89:12]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יָם‎</span> [[Isa.42.10|Isa 42:10]]; [[1Chr.16.32|1Chr 16:32]]; [[Ps.96.11|Ps 96:11]]; [[Ps.98.7|Ps 98:7]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עִיר‎</span> [[Amos.6.8|Amos 6:8]]. 

**4.** phrases: — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎קוֺמָתוֺ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> = ***at full length*** [[1Sam.28.20|1Sam 28:20]] ***full line***, or portion <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַחֶ֫בַל‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[2Sam.8.2|2Sam 8:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַקָּנֶה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מ‎</span> [[Ezek.41.8|Ezek 41:8]] ***full rod*** (reed).
